org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.impl.mtReactors

Class CommonInbox

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.impl.mtReactors.Inbox
      • org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.impl.mtReactors.CommonInbox
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class CommonInbox
extends Inbox
    The inbox used by NonBlockingReactor, ThreadBoundReactor and SwingBoundReactor. CommonInbox uses a single ArrayDeque for the local queue.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.impl.mtReactors.Inbox

        concurrentQueue

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CommonInbox(int initialLocalQueueSize)
      Creates a CommonInbox.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean hasWork()
      Returns true when there is a message in the inbox that can be processed.
      boolean isEmpty()
      Returns true when all the queues are empty.
      boolean isIdle()
      Returns true when the inbox is empty and no request messages are being processed in isolation.
      protected void offerLocal(RequestMtImpl<?> msg)
      Add a message to the appropriate doLocal queue.
      RequestMtImpl<?> poll()
      Retrieves and removes from the inbox the next message to be processed, or returns null if there are no messages that can be processed.

        public boolean hasWork()
        Description copied from class: Inbox
        Returns true when there is a message in the inbox that can be processed. (This method is not thread safe and must be called on the targetReactor's thread.)
